text:
(not totally minimal) working example:
```function add_histograms!(f, g, counts, titles)
    hs = [Axis(f; title) for (_, title) in zip(counts, titles)]
    for (i, h) in enumerate(hs)
        g[1, i] = h
        hidedecorations!(h)
        hidespines!(h)
    end
    topax=g[1, 1:length(counts)] = Axis(f)

    for (count, h) in zip(counts, hs)
        hist!(h, count, bins=2, color=[:red, :green], normalization=:probability)
    end
    linkaxes!(hs...)
    linkyaxes!(topax, hs...)
    hs
end

f = Figure()
g = f[1, 1] = GridLayout()
counts = [
    [rand(1:2) for _=1:rand(6:10)]
    for i=1:3
]
add_histograms!(f, g, counts, ["A", "B", "C"])
f```
(I have a separate grid from the figure since I’m going to have other things in the figure too)
